attributes.action: Creation of a common wealth Union
attributes.additional_details: The government of the day should not be looking to Europe constantly for our British export market, but rather returning to the Common Wealth to draw up a trade agreement between all common wealth countries so we can exchange goods for better market prices than other nations could get.  The Common wealth has a major possible benefit to the British and to each other member will the government go forward and harness this possible source of economic and political mass.
